text: Stephen John Coogan (born 14 October 1965) is a British actor, comedian, writer and television producer. He has played roles in sitcoms and movies. His best known character is Alan Partridge. ==Life== Coogan was born in Middleton, Lancashire and raised in Alkrington. He lives in East Sussex.Steve Coogan in clear == References == == Other websites == * *Chortle Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Greater Manchester Category:Actors from Lancashire Category:British screenwriters Category:British stand-up comedians Category:Comedians from Lancashire Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English voice actors Category:Writers from Lancashire
title: Steve Coogan
